name: RetroBall
description:
This game is a fusion between the classic Pong and Breakout games.

    First to score 10 points wins the game.

Windows/Web/Online Controls:

    Player 1: use Left and Right keys

    Player 2: use "A" and "D" keys

    ESC key: pause

If you enjoy this game, consider supporting me at:

www.ko-fi.com/strictpossum

Made by StrictPossum using Godot 4.0
